subject: Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Call it Winged Foot's revenge on the revered in the United States Open. Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson must defy it if either is to win the 106th championship.
snippet: Call it Winged Foot's revenge on the revered in the United States Open. Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson must defy it if either is to win the 106th championship.
